PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_TractionPowerSystem
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of a traction power system. The property is associated to the predefined type ELECTRICAL of IfcDistributionSystem, and is used to characterise systems such as railway electrical distribution networks used to provide energy for rolling stock.

PropertyDef.Name: PowerSupplyMode
PropertyDef.Definition: Power supply mode of the equipment or system.

PropertyDef.Name: ElectrificationType
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the type of railway electrification.

PropertyDef.Name: RatedFrequency
PropertyDef.Definition: Frequency of the AC electric power supply when the device or system reaches its optimum operating condition.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The optimum voltage for the electrical appliance or system.
